name: antimtv
description: Project for tv's in school  'Antim I'

scripts.build: npm --prefix frontend install && NODE_ENV=production npm --prefix frontend run build && npm --prefix backend install && NODE_ENV=production npm --prefix backend run build
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run build && npm run deploy
scripts.heroku-prebuild: npm --prefix client install && npm --prefix server install

author: Konstantin Bobrovski
